column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " Well , what do you know ?
#Text=" Korra says : " So once we get to the South Pole , then what happens ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You will open an ancient spirit portal .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry , what now ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " At the South Pole , there is a portal that connects our world to the Spirit World , but it has long been closed .
#Text=" Korra says : " And that 's why the evil spirits are attacking ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " There are no evil spirits , there is light and dark in them all .
#Text=But when they 're unbalanced , the darkness takes over .
#Text=If you can open the portal in time , balance will be restored .
#Text=" Korra says : " What do you mean ... in time ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " There 's a reason the Glacier Spirits Festival ends on the winter solstice .
#Text=That 's when the Spirit World and the physical world are close together .
#Text=Only then can the Avatar open the portal .
#Text=" Korra says : " The winter solstice is tomorrow .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Exactly , and we ca n't afford to wait another year .
#Text=" Korra says : " Easy , Naga .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What are those ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Dark spirits .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Let 's keep moving .
#Text=We have to find a safe place to set up camp .
#Text="
